mapper.sql: select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables

select name table_name,crdate create_time,refdate update_time,comment table_comment from (select id,name,crdate,refdate from sysobjects where xtype = 'u' and name != 'sysdiagrams' and name not like 'qrtz%') as i1 left join (select major_id id ,CONVERT(nvarchar(50),isnull(value,'')) comment from sys.extended_properties ex_p where ex_p.minor_id=0) i2 on i1.id=i2.id
mapper.select:
where table_comment <> '' and table_schema = (select database())
AND table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
AND comment like concat('%', #{tableComment}, '%')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
where table_comment <> '' and table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName}
select column_name, data_type, column_comment from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position

SELECT column_name = a.name, data_type = b.name, column_comment = CONVERT(nvarchar(50),isnull(g.[value],'')) FROM syscolumns a left join systypes b on a.xusertype=b.xusertype inner join sysobjects d on a.id=d.id and d.xtype='U' and d.name <> 'dtproperties' left join syscomments e on a.cdefault=e.id left join sys.extended_properties g on a.id=G.major_id and a.colid=g.minor_id left join sys.extended_properties f on d.id=f.major_id and f.minor_id=0 where d.name=#{tableName} order by a.id,a.colorder
